lead_paragraph: The U.S. caught a break in Music City, playing the one opponent not too likely to draw hordes of horn-honking, bell-ringing fans as the Olympic soccer team tries to earn a spot in Beijing this summer.
snippet: The U.S. caught a break in Music City, playing the one opponent not too likely to draw hordes of horn-honking, bell-ringing fans as the Olympic soccer team tries to earn a spot in Beijing this summer.
